results.title: Attitudes towards disability
results.subtitle: Part time
results.content: A lack of understanding and prejudice towards disabled people are still too common in our society. The more it happens, the more impact it has.

results.title: Why I encourage talking about mental health at work
results.subtitle: Part time
results.content: Not only can stressful work environments impact on your mental health, if you don’t feel supported, it makes things even harder.
